segments.text: I'm really worried looking at this kitchen setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stool is tilting back; he could tumble and hit his head.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: With water all over the floor, anyone could slip and fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn't see the overflow; she might step wrong and get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If the stool tips, cookies and the plate could crash everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, so close to danger if it all goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water damage might lead to bigger problems like mold later on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's drying dishes so calmly, but the faucet keeps pouring out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cabinet makes it easy for the boy to reach, but it's precarious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I fear the whole scene could turn into an emergency any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a safe garden, but inside feels so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron hides any awareness of the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's mischief could end in tears and bruises.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's terrifying how unaware everyone seems to the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope nothing bad happens before she notices.
segments.speaker: PAR
